suggestions.reasoning: Lower confluence thresholds (20/22 vs 25/25) should capture more of the missed trades since avg missed trade had 25.5 confluence gap. Adding 'low' volume captures the 22% of missed trades with lower volume. Tiered take profits (25% at each level) should reduce early exits by letting 75% of position ride longer trends. Tighter stop loss helps maintain profit factor while taking more trades.

Increase confluence_gap_min to 25 (closer to missed trades' 26.5 avg) to capture higher quality setups. Lower confluence_score_min to 20 to be less restrictive on entry. Remove 'low' volume to focus on the 76.7% of profitable missed trades with normal+ volume. Implement tiered take-profit levels (25% at each level) instead of single exits to reduce the 1.45% avg left on table. Set stop-loss at 3.5% to maintain reasonable risk management while allowing for normal volatility.
